price: 22. Mpe bobala te basi baye ba tata na bino babalaki, longola sé na maye maleka, ya sôló maye wana mazali bosoto mpe lisumu mpe nzela ya mabe.
arabic: وَلَا تَنكِحُواْ مَا نَكَحَ ءَابَآؤُكُم مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ سَلَفَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَمَقۡتٗا وَسَآءَ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā tankiḥū mā nakaḥa ābāukum mina al-nisāi illā mā qad salafa innahu kāna fāḥishatan wamaqtan wasāa sabīlan
